description.message: Quickly and easily copies info on the current page using a simple and unique template system

error_import_invalid.message: Some values are missing or corrupt!

opt_analytics_sub_text.message: This information is only ever used to help improve user experience and will never be supplied to a 3rd party

opt_anchor_target_text.message: Links open in a new browser tab/window when clicked

opt_anchor_target_sub_text.message: Anchor tags are rendered with the attribute $O_CODE$target="_blank"$C_CODE$

opt_anchor_text.message: This section refers to links that are rendered by the $O_EMPH$Anchor$C_EMPH$ template.

opt_anchor_title_sub_text.message: Anchor tags are rendered with the attribute $O_CODE$title="{{title}}"$C_CODE$

opt_anchor_title_text.message: Links show the contextual title when hovered over

opt_delete_wizard_text_1.message: This action is $O_BOLD$permanent$C_BOLD$ and cannot be reversed.

opt_delete_wizard_text_2.message: Do you want to continue anyway?

opt_errors_header.message: The following problem(s) need to be corrected;

opt_export_wizard_stage_1_text.message: Select the template(s) to be exported.

opt_export_wizard_stage_2_text.message: Copy or download the template data.

opt_guide_introduction_case_sensitivity_.message: The names of simple tags and sections are case-insensitive, therefore $O_CODE${name}$C_CODE$ will output the same as $O_CODE${NaMe}$C_CODE$. However, sections must be opened and closed with names in the same case (i.e. $O_CODE${#name}...{/NaMe}$C_CODE$ will not work).

opt_guide_introduction_dot_notation_text.message: Nested properties of objects can also be accessed using dot notation like $O_CODE${name.nested}$C_CODE$ which would get the $O_EMPH$nested$C_EMPH$ property of the $O_EMPH$name$C_EMPH$ object. These expressions can be even chained to access properties of nested properties and so on.

opt_guide_introduction_inverted_section_.message: $O_BOLD$Access$C_BOLD$ - Only renders the contents if the value is an empty object
$O_BOLD$Conditions$C_BOLD$ - Only renders the contents if the value is $O_EMPH$falsey$C_EMPH$
$O_BOLD$Iterating$C_BOLD$ - Only renders the contents if the value is an empty list
Inverted sections are very similar to normal sections but are written like this $O_CODE${^name}...{/name}$C_CODE$ and can be used in for the following purposes;

opt_guide_introduction_notes_text_1.message: If you are having problems with understanding this guide please $O_LINK_1$https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/dcjnfaoifoefmnbhhlbppaebgnccfddf$O_LINK_2$leave a comment here$C_LINK$ and we will try to help you and take your comments on board, updating the documentation if required.

opt_guide_introduction_notes_text_2.message: If you encounter any problems while using $O_BOLD$Template$C_BOLD$ and/or would like to see a change or addition, please $O_LINK_1$https://github.com/neocotic/template/issues$O_LINK_2$raise an issue$C_LINK$ and we will have a look at it.

opt_guide_introduction_notes_text_3.message: For more examples, try looking at the predefined templates.

opt_guide_introduction_section_access_te.message: $O_BOLD$Access$C_BOLD$ - If the value is an object it will render the contents while exposing the properties of that object as variables

opt_guide_introduction_section_condition.message: $O_BOLD$Conditions$C_BOLD$ - Only renders the contents if the value is $O_EMPH$truey$C_EMPH$

opt_guide_introduction_section_iterating.message: $O_BOLD$Iterating$C_BOLD$ - If the value is an array it will render the contents for each enumerable item of that value

opt_guide_introduction_section_operation.message: $O_BOLD$Operations$C_BOLD$ - Renders the outcome of the operation, passing the contents as the argument

opt_guide_introduction_section_text.message: Sections are always surrounded by opening and closing tags like this $O_CODE${#name}...{/name}$C_CODE$ and can be used for the following purposes;

opt_guide_introduction_simple_tag_text_1.message: Tags are always surrounded by curly braces like this $O_CODE${name}$C_CODE$ and output the value of the named variable. If that value is undefined or $O_EMPH$falsey$C_EMPH$ it will simply be deleted.

opt_guide_introduction_simple_tag_text_2.message: Values are not escaped by default and, in order to do so, you must use double braces like this $O_CODE${{name}}$C_CODE$. This will escape $O_CODE$&$C_CODE$ $O_CODE$<$C_CODE$ $O_CODE$>$C_CODE$ $O_CODE$"$C_CODE$ $O_CODE$'$C_CODE$ characters so that the final output can be safely copied in to $O_ABBR_1$Extensible Markup Language$O_ABBR_2$XML$C_ABBR$ and $O_ABBR_1$Hyper Text Markup Language$O_ABBR_2$HTML$C_ABBR$.

opt_guide_introduction_text.message: $O_BOLD$Template$C_BOLD$ uses an advanced, yet simple, template system to allows you to create and modify the content to be copied to the clipboard. The syntax is really straight-forward and consists of the following categories;

opt_guide_lists_objects_text.message: $O_BOLD$Lists & Objects$C_BOLD$ are generally accessed using sections (including inverted) to iterate over and access properties respectively. However, simple tags can be used to output the contents of a list or the properties of an object in $O_ABBR_1$Comma-Separated Values$O_ABBR_2$CSV$C_ABBR$ format.

opt_guide_options_text.message: $O_BOLD$Options$C_BOLD$ are variables that represent your current $O_BOLD$Template$C_BOLD$ settings and are generally accessed in the same way as standard variables.

opt_guide_options_toolbar_close_text.message: Whether or not the popup is closed immediately after a template is selected

opt_guide_options_toolbar_key_text.message: The unique key of the template activated when the toolbar button is clicked

opt_guide_options_yourls_authentication_.message: The authentication used for the $O_LINK_1$http://yourls.org$O_LINK_2$YOURLS$C_LINK$ service (e.g. $O_EMPH$$EXAMPLE_1$$C_EMPH$, $O_EMPH$$EXAMPLE_2$$C_EMPH$, or nothing if $O_EMPH$$EXAMPLE_3$$C_EMPH$)

opt_guide_standard_last_modified_text.message: The last modified date & time of the page in $O_LINK_1$http://www.faqs.org/rfcs/rfc2822.html$O_LINK_2$RFC 2822$C_LINK$ format

opt_guide_standard_offline_text.message: Whether or not you are currently offline

opt_guide_standard_original_title_text.message: The original title of the page (may be different than $O_LABEL$title$C_LABEL$ if a supported extension was detected and the value of $O_LABEL$title$C_LABEL$ was extracted from this)

opt_guide_standard_original_url_text.message: The original whole $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ being parsed (may be different than $O_LABEL$url$C_LABEL$ if a supported extension was detected and the value of $O_LABEL$url$C_LABEL$ was extracted from this)

opt_guide_standard_referrer_text.message: The $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ of the referring page

opt_guide_standard_relative_text.message: The relative path to the file including the query string (e.g. $O_EMPH$$EXAMPLE$$C_EMPH$)

opt_guide_standard_selection_html_text.message: The $O_ABBR_1$Hypertext Markup Language$O_ABBR_2$HTML$C_ABBR$ behind the current selection

opt_logger_enabled_text.message: Output logs to the JavaScript console

opt_logger_help.message: $O_PARA$Follow these steps if you would like to view the logs;$C_PARA$$O_LIST$$O_ITEM$Bring up the extensions management page by clicking the wrench icon and choosing $O_BOLD$Tools > Extensions$C_BOLD$$C_ITEM$$O_ITEM$Ensure $O_BOLD$Developer mode$C_BOLD$ is checked in the top right of the page$C_ITEM$$O_ITEM$Expand the listing for $O_BOLD$Template$C_BOLD$ and click the $O_BOLD$pages/background.html$C_BOLD$ link$C_ITEM$$O_ITEM$Select the $O_BOLD$Console$C_BOLD$ tab in the new $O_BOLD$Developer Tools$C_BOLD$ window$C_ITEM$$C_LIST$

opt_logger_level_sub_text.message: Only logs at this level or above will be shown

opt_logger_level_text.message: Select the level of logging to be performed

opt_notification_sub_text.message: These will also be used to notify you of any errors that occur

opt_tools_text.message: These settings are normally only used during development but can also be used to create debug information to provide developers with if you're experiencing an issue.
